Title.evidence: Adherence to Prehabilitation in Randomised Controlled Trials: A Systematic Review and Meta-Analysis

Participants.evidence: RCTs involving adults undergoing major elective surgery

Objective.evidence: This study aimed to synthesize adherence measurement and reporting, estimate adherence rates, identify factors associated with adherence, and report barriers and facilitators.

Method_Outcome.evidence: The primary outcome was adherence to prehabilitation, measured continuously or dichotomously.

Trial_Registration.evidence: The study was registered with PROSPERO (CRD42024518851)

Funding.evidence: funded by the Canadian Institutes of Health Research
